briefdescription.para: Removes a cluster by its unique identifier.

parameterdescription.para: Unique identifier of the cluster to remove

briefdescription.para: Remove clusters by their unique identifiers.

parameterdescription.para: Unique identifiers of the clusters to remove

briefdescription.para: Get a copy of the dataset.

simplesect.para: Smart pointer to copy of the dataset

memberdef.name: createSubsetFromSelection

briefdescription.para: Create subset from the current selection and specify where the subset will be placed in the data hierarchy.

parameterdescription.para: Name of the subset in the GUI
Smart pointer to parent dataset in the data hierarchy (default is below the set)
Whether the subset will be visible in the UI

simplesect.para: Smart pointer to the created subset

briefdescription.para: Determines whether items can be selected.
Determines whether all items can be selected.
Determines whether there are any items which can be deselected.
Determines whether the item selection can be inverted (more than one)
Gets point indices for all selected clusters, use getSelectionIndices() got selected cluster indices.
